get.summary: Params queries the parameters of the module.
Queries a list of PubKeys items.
Queries an proposal by id and status.
Queries a list of proposal items by status.

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

reverse.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

fanx.dvm.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.

fanx.dvm.ProposalResult.description:
ProposalResult is the enum type for the proposal result.

 - PROPOSAL_RESULT_UNSPECIFIED: unchosen value
 - PROPOSAL_RESULT_APPROVED: approved
 - PROPOSAL_RESULT_REJECTED: rejected
 - PROPOSAL_RESULT_EXPIRED: expired

fanx.dvm.ProposalStatus.description:
ProposalStatus is the enum type for the proposal status.

 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: unchosen value
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_ACTIVE: active
 - PROPOSAL_STATUS_FINISHED: finished

fanx.dvm.ProposalVote.description:
ProposalVote is the enum type for the proposal vote.

 - PROPOSAL_VOTE_UNSPECIFIED: unchosen value
 - PROPOSAL_VOTE_NO: no
 - PROPOSAL_VOTE_YES: yes

public_keys.description: public_keys contain new pub keys to be added to public keys.

leader_index.description: leader_index is the universal unique identifier of the public key.

fanx.dvm.PubkeysChangeProposalPayload.description:
PubkeysChangeProposalPayload indicates data of public keys changes proposal
ticket.

id.description: id is the sequential id of the proposal generated by the blockchain.

creator.description: creator is the account address of the proposal creator.

modifications.description: modifications contain the ticket payload of the proposal.

votes.description: votes contains the votes of the proposal.

start_ts.description: start_ts is the block time that the proposal is set.

result.description: result is the result of the finished proposal.

result_meta.description: result_meta is the metadata related to the result of the finished proposal.

finish_ts.description: finish_ts is the block time that the proposal is set as finished.

status.description: status is the status of a proposal.

fanx.dvm.PublicKeysChangeProposal.description:
PublicKeysChangeProposal is the type for the proposal for additions and
removals of pub keys.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

fanx.dvm.QueryParamsResponse.description:
QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.
Query/Params RPC method.

list.description: list is the list of allowed public keys.

fanx.dvm.QueryPubKeysResponse.description:
QueryPubKeysResponse is the response type for the public keys list query.
Query/PubKeys RPC method.

fanx.dvm.QueryPublicKeysChangeProposalRe.description:
QueryPublicKeysChangeProposalResponse is the response type for the
Query/PublicKeysChangeProposal RPC method.

fanx.dvm.QueryPublicKeysChangeProposalsR.description:
QueryPublicKeysChangeProposalsResponse is the response type for the
Query/PublicKeysChangeProposals RPC method.

public_key.description: public_key is the public key of the voter.

vote.description: vote is the vote enum value.

fanx.dvm.Vote.description: Vote is the type for the proposal vote.
